Name: Guard Ring
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Treecko, Grovyle, and Sceptile.  You can get a Guard Ring at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Treeck-Thorn, a Treeck-Card, and a Forest Ore. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
